cheatsheet.title: create a new SQL source file

intro.description: This cheat guides you through the creation of a new SQL source file.

item.title: Set file name and sql content
item.description: To open the New SQL File wizard, expand the Libraries node on the DQ Repository view and right click Source Files. Click New SQL File on the context menu. Alternatively, click the link below. Indicate the SQL file metadata (name and location). Upon completion, an editor opens in which you can define the SQL content settings.
